Title: Travel Ground Good Mountain
Items: this area of the mountain seems bursting with color, as the wildflowers are all in bloom here
the ground is smooth granite making travel painless
the earth here is dry and uncluttered, reducing fatigue
tall ridges nearby allow you to travel comfortably in their shade
mountain birds seem to sing you a traveling song as you progress
sturdy packed ground is welcomed as solid footing for weary legs
the dry soil here is packed hard together, making travel effortless
there are shallow ravines throughout the area, however none of them seem to be in your way
a smooth, even grade in this part of the mountain makes travel uncomplicated
the soil here has been washed away, leaving smooth bedrock underfoot
the area is delightfully free of any thick underbrush
a soft black soil layer sits atop the stone underneath, providing a light cusion to each footfall
alpine redwoods provide dappled shade
the area is absolutely teeming with flowering bushes of various color
large broken boulders as big as villages periodically shade your path
the absence of thick undergrowth and other obstacles makes it twice as easy
a shallow layer of snow covers the soil, providing a light cusion to each footfall
the vegetation here seems thinner due to the elevation, which is a nice change of pace
the higher elevation here keeps biting insects at bay
a nearby mountain peak provides near-constant shade
